content: *make an ear flap hat and scarf set for everyone in the family this simple earwarmer hat will be a hit with all ages lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60422 corrections applied nov 15 2006 skill level easy level 2 size one size infant child adult **hat** circumference 16½ 18½ 20½ in 42 47 52 cm **scarf** 5 x 60 in \ 12 5 x 152 5 cm microspun article #910 4 colors 1 ball each *sterling leaf blush fuchsia* *materials are sufficient to make both items in the set* crochet hook - size s-35 speed hook 19 mm 3 in \ 7 5 cm wide piece of cardboard worked with 4 strands of yarn held together throughout scarf is worked in 1-row pattern work edging to finish hat is worked flat sew back seam and add tassels to finish *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
